title: StyledText selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms
description: When using the StyledText widget on bidi platforms, the selection is not rendered correctly. Currently, the entire selection background is being redrawn, but it seems unnecessary because there is code in StyledTextRenderer.drawLine that creates a style range for the selection. This issue should be addressed to improve the rendering of selections on bidi platforms.
OB: Currently, the entire selection background is being redrawn on bidi platforms, which is unnecessary.
EB: The drawLineSelectionBackground method should only be used to render the special line break selection.
SR: Ensure that the selection is rendered correctly on bidi platforms by modifying the drawLineSelectionBackground method to be used only for rendering the special line break selection.
